channel.title: Plot on Think Regressively
channel.description: Recent content in Plot on Think Regressively

item.title: journey
item.description: R Markdown If you have viewed my bio, you will notice that I don’t have a science or engineering background, so how come I end up with data scientist? Well, it turns out that you don’t need a science or engineering background to become a data scientist! Here’s my personal trajectory. I think it’s highly reproducible:smile: In Sep 2014, I was hired as a marketing research analyst by AccuWeather to work on AW’s new adventure: IoT or we call it emerging platform projects.
